metadata.title: CVE-2021-45452 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Storage.save in Django 2.2 before 2.2.26, 3.2 before 3.2.11, and 4.0 before 4.0.1 allows directory traversal if crafted filenames are directly passed to it.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-45452` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.2').
